long_description: The Salomon Agile 12 set hydration pack moves with your body while snugly carrying your gear, whether you're running, mountain biking or enjoying a quick hike. Includes a 50 fl. oz. (1.5 liter) Hydrapak(R) hydration reservoir so you can quickly satisfy your thirst on long runs; reservoir is phthalate free, PVC free and BPA free. Bite valve features an on/off switch to prevent water from escaping when not in use. V-shape pack offers better load distribution for more comfortable carry. Main compartment is large enough to hold extra clothing, food and safety gear; internal zippered pocket. 2 compressible side pockets are perfect for stashing small, quick-access items; zippered pocket on waist belt. Lite shoulder straps feature mesh linings to keep you comfortable; 3D mesh on the back panel helps move moisture away from your back to keep you comfortable on the trail. Waist belt and sternum strap keep pack close. The Salomon Agile 12 Set pack features a built-in trekking pole holder, reflective details and a whistle.
short_description: The Salomon Agile 12 set hydration pack moves with your body while snugly carrying your gear, whether you're running, mountain biking or enjoying a quick hike.
